item.title: Possibility of Real Time Processes In a Cell on Spreadsheet using Google Apps Script
item.description: Gists This is a sample script for investigating the possibility of the real time processes in a cell on Google Spreadsheet using Google Apps Script. As a sample situation, it tried the real time clock in a cell on Google Spreadsheet using Google Apps Script. Demo: Usage: When you use this script, please do the following flow. Copy and paste the following script to the script editor (the container-bound script of Spreadsheet).
